General.Name: Tradeshow Marketing Company Ltd
General.Description: Tradeshow Marketing Company, Ltd. operates as a product development and consumer specialty retail company in Canada and the United States. The company engages in the development and distribution of consumer products for the home and office environments. Its merchandise categories include specialty household, beauty and fitness, home and garden, and small ticket electronics products. The company sells its products to consumers at trade shows, malls, fairs, and exhibitions, as well as through direct response sales from television advertisements and its e-commerce Web sites. Tradeshow Marketing Company, Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is based in Bellevue, Washington.
General.Address: 2018 156th Avenue NE, Bellevue, WA, United States, 98007-3825
